text:
$AVGO Co issues upside guidance for Q2, sees Q2 revs of approx. $7.9 bln vs. $7.42 bln S&P Capital IQ Consensus. 
Also, sees Q2 Adjusted EBITDA guidance of approximately 62.5 percent of projected revenue.

$AVGO Reports Q1 (Jan) earnings of $8.39 per share, excluding non-recurring items, $0.26 better than the S&P Capital IQ Consensus of $8.13; revenues rose 15.8% year/year to $7.71 bln vs the $7.61 bln S&P Capital IQ Consensus.

- Adj Rev: $7.71B (est $7.61B) 
- Adj EPS: $8.39 (est $8.13) 
- Semiconductor Solutions Rev.: $5.87B (est $5.76B 
- Sees Q2 Rev: $7.9B (est $7.41B 
- Sees Q2 Adj. EBITDA Approx. 62.5% Of Rev.
